website_summaries.verdict: An all-natural multivitamin supplement that will support your dog's overall health in many ways.
pros: Made in the United States, which means you can count on the ingredients
Contains many different vitamins and minerals to support your pet in its overall health
Only contains raw and natural whole food ingredients
cons: Some dogs have digestive sensitivity to the formula
Some dogs won't like the taste and smell

customer_reviews.title: Price keeps changing and it's frustrating
customer_reviews.text: We cook for our French bulldog and French bulldog mix due to our Frenchie having IBD. The recipe we use recommended this vitamin supplement and the dogs seem to really like it mixed with their breakfast. My only complaint is it goes from reasonably priced to over-priced all the time and the inconsistency in pricing frustrates me so I'm considering using something else.
customer_reviews.author: TeenyTinyWho

customer_reviews.title: Great supplement for my dog's homemade food!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I make homemade dog food. After reading the reviews, I was a little skeptical because a lot of the reviews said they would not recommend it because their dog was getting sick from this product, but my dog is doing great on this product and I would recommend it 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Kr2009al

customer_reviews.title: I find no problems with this supplement.
customer_reviews.text: This will be my 23 order of Canine Complete. I never had any of the issues other reviews are voicing. I have home cooked for my dogs as far back as I can remember, and this was the best, most complete supplement I found. The company is great to deal with and I really don’t understand why animals are getting sick from it. However, the animals must come first. Call the company, discuss and perhaps this can be resolved.
customer_reviews.author: JoGo

customer_reviews.title: This product has garlic, I would not recommend it,
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying this product for some time and it was giving my Husky mix diarrhea. I looked at the ingredients (which I thought I had already done), and there’s garlic listed. According to the ASPCA and other sources, dogs can’t have garlic. I’m surprised this product is NASC certified. Some sources say dogs can have a little garlic, but it’s not recommended. I’m disappointed and not happy a vitamin company that’s NASC certified would include this ingredient. I will no longer be buying this product for my dogs unless they remove garlic.
customer_reviews.author: James H.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great product if you feed raw
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product if you feed raw. Used to add fresh vegetables and fruit plus other items to get the right vitamins and minerals but this is a wonderful time saving product. Yes it is a bit gritty but my two 6lb maltese don't mind it at all. Have purchased the larger 4 lb tub as it does save on $$$$. Have purchased this a few times already and the best place to buy is here on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: red66mustang

customer_reviews.title: Helpful product for aged doggy
customer_reviews.text: Giving this to my 14 year old Lab/Dalmatian who has a gazillion allergies and spinal myelopathy. Worst of all was a sudden skin problem with extremely flaky dryness & fur falling out everywhere. Started her on this supplement as well as giving medicated baths 2x/week for a month and she is now in much better shape. Still a little flaky but overall has stopped losing fur, has a fantastic appetite, and seems to love the taste of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kareful Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Was recommended to me by a breeder
customer_reviews.text: I use this for all my dogs - big and small. Was recommended to me by a breeder. My dogs are all shelter dogs and one dog was covered in mange but his coat is gorgeous now. I also use this as the supplement to my dogs food since I make their food instead of feeding them store bought food.
customer_reviews.author: kristina hattan

customer_reviews.title: allergy
customer_reviews.text: i have a bad experience with the product give it to my dog and she hade a allergic reason had to take her to the hospital emergency room I not saying the product is no good but to be careful
customer_reviews.author: galle sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Improved my 3 dogs poop and breath.
customer_reviews.text: Using for my 3 dogs for about 2 weeks. Happy to report they eat it in their food with no issues and it is loaded with natural ingredients. Their poop is firm and solid with no messy butt issues which I’ve had in the past. Their breath has improved and I am expecting that soon I will see an improvement in their coats.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Wathen

customer_reviews.title: Great product if you home cook for your dogs
customer_reviews.text: If you are feeding raw or slightly cooking for your dogs, this is a great source of vitamins and essential nutrients that is missing from home cooked dog diets. I like that it's organic and doesn't have unnecessary additives.
customer_reviews.author: Bon924

customer_reviews.title: My dog has mast cell cancer. Raw food, ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog has mast cell cancer. Raw food, these probiotics and 1 Tbsp coconut oil every day are shrinking his tumors.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Karabas

customer_reviews.title: What’s not to like
customer_reviews.text: This supplement is added to my homemade dog food. She has 2 repaired ACLs and has shown no signs of limping. I’ve been able to take her off glycoflex III and as an added bonus, I’ve noticed her teeth look better. I wonder if the ingredients are similar to that in the plaque off product.
customer_reviews.author: Rescueapet

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS STUFF!
customer_reviews.text: I make my own raw dog food and need to be able to add in pro/pre biotics, trace minerals, omegas and fiber. This product allows me to just buy ONE thing and get everything I need in one place instead of having 5 different products. It can be a bit pricey but it's usually on sale...
customer_reviews.author: Doofer

customer_reviews.title: So Very Sad!!!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! I WAS HOPING THIS WOULD BE THE ANSWER FOR MY GOLDEN AS WE COOK FOR HER DAILY. SHE WAS SICK FOR 2 DAYS AFTER ONE DOSE OF THIS. THE VET BILL CAME TO $995!!! THE VET SAID IT COULD BE A TAINTED BATCH. OF COURSE I SENT THIS BACK AND CANNOT RECOMMEND. THAT'S MY DOGS REACTION TO THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: John M

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Probiotics & Essential Vitamins and minerals!!!
customer_reviews.text: We've used this product for a long time now and it's so awesome. Having probiotics and all of those awesome vitamins and minerals, it helps knowing that my dogs are receiving proper nutrition and they all have healthy guts. That's the main area of concern when keeping a pet healthy. We'll continue to use this product and we always tell others how awesome it is. We use this and a superfood called Supermix from Zija and our dogs are so energetic, playful, happy, content, just the absolute best we've ever seen them!! Thank you for this amazing product!! Please don't ever change it!!
customer_reviews.author: kenneth krzyzewski

customer_reviews.title: Caused diarrhea
customer_reviews.text: I can't even believe I'm writing this because it had all around good reviews. My very healthy shiba-we switched over to home cooked meals to avoid any added garbage the canned stuff has. We bought this as a supplement to make sure he has all of his nutrition. He has had 3 accidents in the middle of the night since taking this a full week and even had blood in his stool... I feel absolutley horrible about it and i immediately took him off.
customer_reviews.author: Maryann Seales

customer_reviews.title: CAUTION - may cause VOMITING!
customer_reviews.text: I tried everything - smaller doses, mixing with different food, only feeding supplement once a week, but my dog vomited every time this supplement was added to his meal. I wish they would sell a smaller amount to try out before investing in a $22 tub.
customer_reviews.author: D. Larson

customer_reviews.title: Better than Nupro
customer_reviews.text: My dog digs the flavor and is looking shinier and acting more energetic after switching from Nupro. She is fed a handmade meal at night with meat and Sojos Vegetables, and I feel like this supplement covers any gaps in her nutrition.
customer_reviews.author: Ponekin

customer_reviews.title: Really Works a difference you can see in 3 weeks!
customer_reviews.text: We noticed a difference in our 3 dogs, that vary in age & breed. Our vet was very impressed when I showed the ingredients label. Said, keep on giving, that it looked like an awesome suppliment. I worry since they have different health concerns & making their food has become the only option. It's been a long an experimental road. I'm big believer in vitamins & suppliments. Thank you Wholistic!
customer_reviews.author: D. Singletary

customer_reviews.title: Perfect addition to homemade diets
customer_reviews.text: I use this to add to my homemade dog food. It’s probably not a good idea to add to kibble. This adds the perfect balance of the vitamins lacking in a fresh food diet. 2 of my dogs are 8 year old Bostons & the other is a 4 year old Frenchie. They have never been healthier.
customer_reviews.author: LF

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: I began using this product for my 15 lb. Dachshund a few months ago. At the age of 9, he developed major digestive issues. After much experimentation, I now make his food (poached ground turkey, pumpkin puree, pureed peas and oatmeal - yummy) and then supplement it with a heaping teaspoon of the Canine Complete mixed in with each feeding. He loves the taste. As an added benefit, his coat is softer than it has ever been. Digestive issues are resolved. Thank goodness - for us both.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: taste
customer_reviews.text: My two dogs just love their Canine Complete. I sprinkle it on their wet food and they eat it up. One of my dogs got an infection and lost half his body weight. No matter what I did he could not gain weight. I started Canine Complete of them and my sickly dog began to gain weight and now has stabilized.
customer_reviews.author: Haliena Leclerc

customer_reviews.title: Two paws up
customer_reviews.text: Started giving this to my dog that has seizures and it has decreased them. Not sure what kind of magic this is, but it is doing something. The dogs love the flavor and we add it to their homemade food before we freeze it. Sometimes we make a gravy with it and pour it on their food.
customer_reviews.author: Dan2131

customer_reviews.title: Great Results !
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to boost my dog’s nutrients and found this. I mostly cook for my 11 year old girl and wanted to make sure she was getting all she needed . She is doing so good, her eyes are beautiful and bright and she is full of energy !
customer_reviews.author: beachgirl

customer_reviews.title: ... count or whether it was flushing out the icky unnecessary lepto vaccine that I foolishly allowed new (and now ...
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if this reversed my 8 year old dachshund's high liver enzyme count or whether it was flushing out the icky unnecessary lepto vaccine that I foolishly allowed new (and now former) vet to inject. Whatever the case, I religiously used this every day for a month, along with doing a Dr Dodd cleansing homemade fish and veg diet and now he's fine. Whew. Oh, and this stuff is very palatable says my dog. Although, he'll eat just about anything.
customer_reviews.author: Diamond Girl

customer_reviews.title: No “Best By” Date
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this for a full refund. An extra sticker is attached over the original label. "Best by” date is artificially removed or erased from the original label. I couldn’t be sure if it is safe for my dog. So, for safety purpose, I can’t give this to my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Park

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: We have to make our dogs food because he has so many allergies. We add this into every meal to make sure our dog is getting all the vitamins he needs. Two years of using Canine Complete Multivitamins and our veterinarian is extremely happy with our dogs health.
customer_reviews.author: TARA

customer_reviews.title: Did not work at all for my dogs
customer_reviews.text: This did not work at all for my dogs. Loose stools and immediately had both dogs scratching a LOT, biting at themselves, digging at ears, etc. I tried them on and off it 3 separate times. (No other diet changes) Had to throw it out.
customer_reviews.author: barn girl

customer_reviews.title: Vet Recommended
customer_reviews.text: My Chihuahua has had stomach problems and her food has been changed to home cooked chicken and veggies along with her taking this supplement as advised by my Vet. She hasn't had a stomach problem in the last five months since changing.
customer_reviews.author: N. Acheson

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but 2 times the seal came broken and lid cracked open w/product spilled everywhere.
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great, however; this is the 2nd time weve purchased from Gold Karat/Amazon and both times it arrived with the lid broken open and product all over the box. For $100.00 I would like the product to not be broken open AND TO HAVE 100% OF THE ITEM.....the first time more than half of the supplement was spilled out and gone and this time about a 1/3 of the supplement was spilled out and gone.
customer_reviews.author: LeoKincaide

customer_reviews.title: My dogs like it
customer_reviews.text: I have not had any issues with this product. My dogs seems to like it from day one and didn’t even notice it was in their food. Their stool didn’t change nor did they have diarrhea or vomiting. I don’t know if it’s the pre or probiotics but one of my dogs use to occasionally eat the others poopies but no longer seems to want to do it so I hope she has stop for good!
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Shiny coat
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my French Bulldog’s dry food, then add water and make a “gravy”. His coat is noticeably shinier and his bowel movements are better after using this. He gobbles up his food just fine with it. Though he would probably eat cardboard if allowed. I have however seen how good his coat looks after using this product, so I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Andi

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so happy I purchased this product for my dog. She has allergy issues and had a patch of missing hair and overall thinning. After using Wholistic Let Canine Complete, her hair is growing back and no longer thinning. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: CBK

customer_reviews.title: All Three Dogs Have Loved It
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? Three dogs: a GSD, American Bulldog and now my Boxer have all been on this and they all love it and are thriving. DO NOT start your dog out on a full dose. GRADUALLY increase the amount over a month. Keep an eye on your dog's stools and, of course, if they vomit or refuse to eat it, don't give it to them. It's not rocket surgery.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Tyler

customer_reviews.title: A+ Product
customer_reviews.text: I recently had to switch my dog over to homemade food due to numerous allergies. This vitamin powder is super easy to use. It comes with a scoop in it and you just add one scoop a day to your dogs food. I haven't had my dog turn his nose up to it so it can't be bad tasting. This is a product I will continue to buy.
customer_reviews.author: Bratlie

customer_reviews.title: Best doggy vitamins ever!! Dog approved!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE these vitamins for my dog. She loves eating them too, she licks her bowl clean to get them all. It’s helped her coat, breathe and waste a lot. I’ve bought this product three times in a row now. I highly recommend for all dogs on a daily use. I also use salmon oil on her food and it mixes great sticking to the dry food!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Judd

customer_reviews.title: Dogs like it
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! My dogs love it and it makes a great topping on raw chicken breast. A lot of dogs who only eat raw food sometimes suffer from nutrition deficiencies, but this stuff along with some coconut oil keeps their coats shiny and their bodies healthy.
customer_reviews.author: John Laden

customer_reviews.title: I Can See A Difference!
customer_reviews.text: My dog is responding wonderfully to this product. Her skin and coat are improving by the day. Her perkiness is coming back. My only complaint is that this supplement must not taste very good. I mix it thoroughly in her wet/home prepared food yet I see that quite a bit of the supplement remains in the bowl. I know that my bichon is not getting the full dosage. Other than the taste issue, the product seems to be working.
customer_reviews.author: Joan M. Leaver

customer_reviews.title: Holistic Doctor Approves!!
customer_reviews.text: I was recc to use this for my 10 year old pug to ensure she is getting all of the nutrients that her food doesn’t provide. It comes w a little measuring table on the label and sooon to measure. It does not smell great, but what vitamin does? Dog tolerated it ok and I’ve been feeding it to her twice a day for the past month.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great supplement! I add a scoop to my dogs ...
customer_reviews.text: Great supplement! I add a scoop to my dogs home made dinner and it is not only great for her health but she loves it. I have to say the first time I introduce this supplement to her dinner she did not eat it but when she finally decided to try it she liked it. Love that she gets all this nutrients every day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My Maltipoo LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: I have a Maltipoo who at this point is six months old. After reading that most dog foods only supply the very minimum nutritional value, I found this product. I started off using very little and worked my way up to about 1/4 of a scoop. It calls to use more but my puppy is very small and I didn’t want to overwhelm her small portions of food. She has no problem eating and seems to like it fine. We only give it to her in the morning with wet food. I will continue to use it as I feel it will benefit her health in the long run.
customer_reviews.author: J. Niccolich

customer_reviews.title: Getting my dog what he needs
customer_reviews.text: My sweet old dog has had digestive problems for some time. Recently he has been in turkey and rice. Can’t seem to keep anything else down. I was worried he wasn’t getting enough minerals and vitamins plus his probiotics My cousin recommended canine complete. It has pre and probiotics ! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Karma

customer_reviews.title: Dog seems to thrive in this daily addition
customer_reviews.text: I have consistently given this to my dog, a standard poodle who has digestive issues and I have been quite satisfied. I cook for her and she doesn’t get the vitamin laden kibble so I feel confident she is getting vitamins in addition to pro and pre biotics I do not give her the full dosage but cut it in half and she is doing great.
customer_reviews.author: Lynnz

customer_reviews.title: Great for active dogs
customer_reviews.text: My 11 year old pit mix has reoccurring tumors the last 3 years. This stuff has helped her become active again and elevated her mood plus it's helped with her weight since having the tumors and a thyroid gland removed. Our 2 year old German shepherd also benefits from this.
customer_reviews.author: dinesh m alvis

customer_reviews.title: Great to mix in home cooked dog food
customer_reviews.text: I started cooking my Doberman’s food as soon as he was diagnosed with cancer. This product insures me that he is getting a well balanced diet. This along with other supplements has kept him going strong for over two years! I highly recommend using this if you’re cooking your dogs food
customer_reviews.author: Elthe Yogi

customer_reviews.title: LIKE THIS
customer_reviews.text: Product seems to be working well after a month's use. Previously, I used another good product. What I like better about this product is it's more granular than powdered and the dogs seem to prefer that. No balking at eating it, so I assume it's flavorful to them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Changed my dogs health!!
customer_reviews.text: Okay it was also changing to making fresh food for my dog, I suppose. But, my 12 year old cairn terrier has new spunk thanks to her new diet. This is a big part of that. I wanted to make sure she wasn't missing out on any vitamins or minerals when I began making her food, so I feel better adding this as a supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs are doing great on it! Our Vet was so impressed that I got my little girl to put and keep a bit of weight and how well her coat and overall shape and condition she was in making my own dog food! My puppies did great too!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Davis

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff for my three dogs
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff and feel good about giving it to my pets. I've made their food their entire lives and this gives it any added vitamins and minerals they may need. I sprinkle it over their ground turkey and sweet potatoes. I also add a few raw veggies and fruits of my own.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Noticed no difference
customer_reviews.text: My dog has dry skin and itches a lot. It is very dry here in So. California so I was hoping this would help. Used the whole jar and no difference.
customer_reviews.author: Gretchen

customer_reviews.title: She loves this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 12 year old Pit Bull who has dry skin, sheds like crazy 365 days year itchy skin. I have been giving it to her for a couple weeks now and haven't noticed any help for her, but she loves it mixed with her dry food. I haven't seen any negative signs from it neither, will continue and see if there are any signs of help for her.
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Great supplement
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a recommendation from reddit. I have 2 senior corgis that are raw fed. I use this to supplement their food so they get all of the vitamins and minerals they need. It has a lot of good stuff in it and my dogs gobble it up with their food. I've never had issues with diarrhea or vomiting like some other reviews are stating, and one of my dogs has a very sensitive stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Sesilee

customer_reviews.title: She is doing wonderfully on this supplement
customer_reviews.text: I have a 12 1/2 yr old maltese with knee issues. She is doing wonderfully on this supplement! Her mobility is markedly noticeable and she feels very good. I am really happy with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Constanza Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Natural Solution
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a good vitamin supplement for my dog since I have opted to feed them an all natural diet. I wanted to be sure they were getting all the vitamins, minerals, and probiotics they needed total body health. Wholistic Canine Complete delivers this and I can already see a difference in my dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Diann Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Too high price
customer_reviews.text: I believe that this stuff is great, but since the price went up, I cannot afford to purchase it any longer. It used to be $22 and $38 for the 2lb. So I suppose it’s for wealthy dogs only!! So messed up
customer_reviews.author: Claudia D

customer_reviews.title: The Quality and price you can pay through amazon, and keeping our dogs healthy are key in this product
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs have been steady consumers of Wholistic Pet Organics Canine Complete Since 2014. Our dogs are an active small breed mix and keeping their gut in check is the way to go with Wholistic Pet Organics Canine Complete. Their bowel movements are consistent and easy to clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Batsnookums

customer_reviews.title: Dog doesn't eat kelp
customer_reviews.text: My dog won't touch his food when this stuff is added to it, and he's not typically a picky eater. I noticed the first ingredient is kelp after I bought it, so it's no wonder my dog doesn't like it I would recommend getting the smallest size before purchasing any larger ones to see if your dog lies it or not.
customer_reviews.author: Legumebo M.

customer_reviews.title: Great so far for my Doberman n Pug
customer_reviews.text: Item came fast and so far my pups have been on it mixed with there raw diet for 2 days n they r doing great.. there poop has a perfect consistency n the allergies n coat are already improving
customer_reviews.author: Sunday Morning

customer_reviews.title: MY DOG GOT SICK - Read the other reviews
customer_reviews.text: I was really disappointed and so glad my dog is ok now. But just like the other reviewers that had problems, within 24 hours of taking this, my dog stopped eating. She didn't feel well and was shaking. Luckily I read the reviews before and recognized the symptoms. Perhaps some dogs can stomach this, but there is a danger of dogs NOT adapting to this. Not sure of the reason but if you buy, be aware.
customer_reviews.author: Shana

customer_reviews.title: Works well so far
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I cook fresh for my frenchie and wanted a supplement to make sure he was getting everything he needs. I mix half a serving with breakfast and half with dinner and he gobbles it right up. No puking, vomiting or turning up his nose. Will keep purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Jelena

customer_reviews.title: This works.
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old Bouvier has been having some severe skin problems with odor. We are using Fromm food and we added this to his food. Within a week he was much better. After a month, he is like a new dog. This stuff works.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Apparently very delicious
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this so much. I actually had to change their eating schedule because one of my dogs kept stealing the other's food, which he has never done before. It goes pretty fast though with both of them.
customer_reviews.author: Jodee Winship

customer_reviews.title: Greatb supplem not!
customer_reviews.text: I am making my own dog food now (not raw) meat cooked. I use the meat with many frozen vegetables and fruits. This is a supplement that I add to make sure my dogs get all of the vitamins and minerals that they need. My dogs seem to be thriving and I know everything that my dogs are eating.
customer_reviews.author: carol crane

customer_reviews.title: Not sure on this....
customer_reviews.text: We are on the fence with this one. With the added fiber we expected it to help with hard stools and constipation two of our dogs. It didn’t help. The dogs liked the flavor and licked the bowls clean.
customer_reviews.author: Simply Shrek and Fierce Fiona

customer_reviews.title: Fountain of Youth for Dogs
customer_reviews.text: Replaced simple probiotics & enzymes with this a m.h azong supplement. My 8 yr. old & 3 yr. old Maltese dogscare like pups again. They look &;feel much healthier!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Eisenberg

customer_reviews.title: Smells terrible...
customer_reviews.text: It smells terrible and my dogs don't like it. How does it work? Who knows, I didn't see any difference in dogs well being.
customer_reviews.author: Mark K.

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love the flavor
customer_reviews.text: This product is great, no more bad doggy breath... excellent for my dog's gut health, way less frequent doddy gas... Stool looks healthy and solid... 😊
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Convenient nutrients for my dog
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t tasted it but when it is mixed in with my dogs food he eats it. It appears to have the nutrients dogs need if you are cooking their food.
customer_reviews.author: cb

customer_reviews.title: Love Wholistic products!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, my dogs love it too and their coats, skin, along with quality dog food looks marvelous. I also buy this in the cat version and they love it too. So 5 stars all around for this Wholistic line.
customer_reviews.author: Tammyc

customer_reviews.title: Thank you for making this stuff!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm so pleased that our dogs like this stuff! Due to allergies, we make our dog's food, but we needed a complete vitamin for their health... and thank goodness, they eat it all (even the peas)!!
customer_reviews.author: Sheryl

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended supplement.
customer_reviews.text: We have to home cook for our maltese because she had severe food allergies. We have been using this supplement to make sure she is getting all the nutrients she needs and our vets constantly tell us how healthy and well-nourished she is. Highly recommended supplement.
customer_reviews.author: Felix G.

customer_reviews.title: My dog says it's yummy!1
customer_reviews.text: My Vet recommended this product and my dog loves it. The perfect combination that benefits my pooch.
customer_reviews.author: C. Glasser

customer_reviews.title: GOOD ADDITION TO MEALTIME
customer_reviews.text: Started making my own meals for overweight dog so wanted to add supplement to make sure she is getting everything she needs. Her coat has definitely improved and she looks good. She's also losing weight. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: CAROL

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I make my dogs food so this is a great supplement to add.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Llewellyn

customer_reviews.title: Dog doesn't like it.  Smelly
customer_reviews.text: Makes the food smell funny. Dog ate it once and never touched food that had it in again. It smells like fish meets kale.
customer_reviews.author: Versco

customer_reviews.title: Healthy supplement!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Been using Wholistic Pet Organics since our golden retriever was a puppy. The breeder suggested a raw diet and my wife and i use this as a supplement to his raw meal. Our vet suggested this and his coat is shiny and he looks handsome!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: meh, didn't really see a crazy change. If ...
customer_reviews.text: meh, didn't really see a crazy change. If your dog is on a specific diet with no pet food involved, just buy them some vitamins. That should help
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I add it to homemade dog food
customer_reviews.text: I make my own dog food at home and add this to the mix. It’s good stuff. Just read the label!! You’ll be sold on it too!
customer_reviews.author: Arnold Botwinick

customer_reviews.title: Good for intermittent distribution
customer_reviews.text: Great product but I was afraid I would be overdosing my pets on vitamins. Dogs can die from too high vitamin D or calcium levels so I didn’t want to risk it.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah J

customer_reviews.title: Great price as compared to store
customer_reviews.text: What is a much better value than buying from the pet store. Very same stuff, and our dog loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Everyone's Happy
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my dog's food, and it's been approved by 2 dog crew. A little stinky from the fishy stuff but not overwhelming. Their coats looks great since we've been adding this, and my sensitive tummied senior dog has no issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: BE

customer_reviews.title: Great suppliment
customer_reviews.text: My Shiz tu has done great. Because if his size I cut dose to 2 tsp. His skin and hair have improved. No sores on back either
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Langer

customer_reviews.title: Needs more flavor
customer_reviews.text: My dogs try to eat around it every night, but eventually eat it when they get hungry enough.
customer_reviews.author: Kayci Leigh

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE OF THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Beware of this product!!! I gave half of the dose for a dog 5-10 pounds (1/2 teaspoon) ... mind you my dog is almost 15 pounds, and she got terribly sick. She vomited for hours, and had shortness of breathe and uncontrollable shaking. Took her to the emergency vet, had to get fluids and x-rays..... cost me $450!!! I will never use this again! I wish I could get my money back!
customer_reviews.author: Dick

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: As I do not use this for my own personal use it is hard to say if it is doing what it is to do. My dogs love it and have had no adverse reaction to it.
customer_reviews.author: Tom S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent human-grade supplement for dogs!
customer_reviews.text: This is an EXCELLENT supplement, I recommend it to everyone. Especially those that have dogs with skin problems.
customer_reviews.author: S. Lieb

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Haha. I hope this review overwrites the other one I just left. I thought I was leaving a review for something else. My dog loves this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Pup doesn’t seem to notice it in food
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Started cooking for my dog and add this on top. He seems to not even notice, so I’ll find out for sure w he I get his next check up.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this - feed raw and feel this gives me the additives I need for my dogs.
customer_reviews.author: Patti J.

customer_reviews.title: 😊
customer_reviews.text: dog love it seen a big difference in his bowl movement and smells
customer_reviews.author: jennell

customer_reviews.title: Dog loves this.
customer_reviews.text: I use this to make sure my dog gets all his vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Smith

customer_reviews.title: Shinier coats!
customer_reviews.text: My pets seem to like the taste and their coats are very shiny!
customer_reviews.author: Chika

customer_reviews.title: My 9 year old golden retriever who has had both cruciate ligaments repaired acts like a puppy (still)
customer_reviews.text: I would not be without this. My 9 year old golden retriever who has had both cruciate ligaments repaired acts like a puppy (still) !
customer_reviews.author: Snow bunny

customer_reviews.title: My dog doesnt fart anymore
customer_reviews.text: Easy to scoop. Smells weird but my dogs dont mind. My dog doesnt cut the cheese anymore. Since I started putting this on his food.
customer_reviews.author: R. Knight

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Have a small dog and slowly introduced this to her food. Have no issues with it and provides great nutrition.
customer_reviews.author: LawdBlackadder

customer_reviews.title: It's a bit grassy smelling
customer_reviews.text: Took my dogs a bit to eat this, it smells like fresh cut hay. Which I like the smell of. But my dogs didn't like it at first. I mix it with yogert.
customer_reviews.author: Terrie Richards

customer_reviews.title: Nutrition that’s easy
customer_reviews.text: I add this stuff to my dogs raw food diet I feed her and she really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Lowder

customer_reviews.title: Good supplement
customer_reviews.text: We make out dogs food so we’ve been using this as a supplement for over a year now. Great product, ships fast!
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs absolutely love the taste of this stuff! I started with just a quarter of the recommended serving size. Over a few days I slowly increase to a full serving to avoid any upset stomachs. Neither of my dogs had any issues. They really seem to enjoy the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I put a scoop of this and my dogs raw food every day, so far I’ve ordered three and we love it
customer_reviews.text: I put a scoop of this and my dogs raw food every day, so far I’ve ordered three and we love it
